flowers.name: Rose
flowers.description: Roses are known for their beauty and fragrance. They are one of the most popular flowers used to express love and affection.

flowers.name: Lily
flowers.description: Lilies are elegant and fragrant flowers often associated with purity and devotion. They are frequently used in religious ceremonies.

flowers.name: Tulip
flowers.description: Tulips are vibrant spring-blooming flowers symbolizing renewal and fresh starts. They grow in many bright colors.

flowers.name: Sunflower
flowers.description: Sunflowers are tall, cheerful flowers known for turning to face the sun. They represent adoration and loyalty.

flowers.name: Orchid
flowers.description: Orchids are exotic and delicate flowers symbolizing luxury and elegance. They have intricate petals and come in many varieties.

flowers.name: Jasmine
flowers.description: Jasmine is a small white flower famous for its intoxicating fragrance. It symbolizes purity, simplicity, and sensuality.

flowers.name: Marigold
flowers.description: Marigolds are bright and hardy flowers often used in religious rituals and decorations. They represent passion and creativity.

flowers.name: Lavender
flowers.description: Lavender is a purple flower known for its soothing fragrance and calming effects. It symbolizes peace and cleanliness.

flowers.name: Lotus
flowers.description: Lotus is a sacred flower in many cultures, symbolizing purity, enlightenment, and rebirth. It grows in muddy water but blooms clean.

flowers.name: Daffodil
flowers.description: Daffodils are cheerful yellow flowers that bloom in early spring. They are symbols of hope and new beginnings.

flowers.name: Hibiscus
flowers.description: Hibiscus is a tropical flower known for its large, colorful petals. It represents beauty, glory, and femininity.

flowers.name: Peony
flowers.description: Peonies are lush and full flowers that symbolize romance and prosperity. They are often used in weddings and festive events.

flowers.name: Chrysanthemum
flowers.description: Chrysanthemums are widely used for ornamental purposes. They symbolize longevity, joy, and optimism.

flowers.name: Carnation
flowers.description: Carnations are long-lasting flowers with a spicy fragrance. Each color carries different meanings, from love to admiration.

flowers.name: Daisy
flowers.description: Daisies are simple and cheerful flowers symbolizing innocence and purity. They bloom in meadows and gardens alike.

flowers.name: Zinnia
flowers.description: Zinnias are hardy and vibrant flowers that bloom abundantly. They represent lasting friendship and endurance.

flowers.name: Aster
flowers.description: Asters are daisy-like wildflowers symbolizing patience and elegance. They are often used in autumn decorations.

flowers.name: Gladiolus
flowers.description: Gladiolus flowers are tall and sword-shaped. They symbolize strength of character and honor.

flowers.name: Snapdragon
flowers.description: Snapdragons are whimsical flowers that resemble dragon heads. They represent grace and strength.

flowers.name: Morning Glory
flowers.description: Morning glories are vine flowers that bloom with the sunrise. They symbolize affection and the fleeting nature of life.
